name: Radiation Warning
description:
RADIATION WARNING

An endless vertical scrolling game partially inspired by doodle jump.

INSTRUCTIONS:

Navigate with the arrow keys, gain powerups and avoid enemies as you climb up as long as you can manage.

CREDITS:

Art

  • Madeline M.
  • Makayla C.

Sound:

  • Thomas A.
